name: Treehugger Tycoon
description:
Welcome to the life of a treehugger! In this simulation you will take the roll of a fearless and renown treehugger who will stop at nothing to help this forest prosper. Water trees, fend off lumberjacks and recruit other treehuggers to watch mother nature grow. 

  Use Renown Points to recruit new members. Recruit Points are gained by growing trees to full size, as well as running off lumberjacks. Score is determined by the size of your forest. The tree hud at the top of the screen shows how many trees you have left to be chopped down before it is game over.

Have Fun!
